article:
During the Vietnam War, 'Operation Enhance' and 'Enhance Plus' was the emergency
transfer of American military supplies and bases to the South Vietnamese
government in advance of the cease fire that ended American involvement in the
war. Conducted in an intense month-and-half period at the end of 1972. {{cite book |title= Vietnam: a visual encyclopedia |last= Gutzman
|first= Philip C. |authorlink= Philip C. Gutzman |year= 2002 |publisher= PRC
Publishing |location= University of California |isbn= 1-85648-639-7 |page= 143
|url= http://books.google.com/books?id=kQwZAQAAIAAJ&q=%22Operation+Enhance+Plus-
%22&dq=%22Operation+Enhance+Plus%22&hl=en&ei=3XuDTdj-
GIbG0QHx5LDWCA&sa=X&oi=book_result&ct=result&resnum=2&ved=0CCsQ6AEwAQ}}
categories: Military operations of the Vietnam War|Enhance Plus
Battles and operations of the Vietnam War in 1972|Enhance Plus
